|brand = Accton |model = UK0022 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (142306-400) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/16/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Accton_UK0022_(142306-400) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = ISA |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Accton UK0022 (142306-400)]] â€¢ [http://nostalgy.net.ru/museum/ne2000/uk0022.jpg PCB] :[https://vk.com/albums174994261?z=photo174994261_400302489%2Fphotos174994261 "Combo" Network Card] (NE2000) :"thick coax" (10BASE-5) - 500m :"thin coax" (10BASE-2) - 200m :"twisted pair" (10BASE-T) - 100m
It appears the [[Accton]] UK0022 is Unisys ''NE2000'' compatible. :It's assumed to use the '''ne''' driver.
==See also== :[http://nostalgy.net.ru/museum/ne2000.htm NE2000 (Novell Eagle 2000)] *[[Accton UK0022 (142306-400)]] *[[Accton UK0023 (142066-400)]] *[[Relia RE2000]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8019AS *[[Kingston KNE2021LC]] *[[SMC Ether EZ (8416)]]
